item.title: 据说加密货币交易所 HashKey 的香港 IPO 定价接近区间上限
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港最大的持牌加密货币交易所运营商 HashKey Holdings Ltd. 的首次公开募股定价达到了市场定价范围的上限，共募集资金 16 亿港元（约合 2.06 亿美元）。【原文：HashKey Holdings Ltd., the operator of Hong Kong’s largest licensed cryptocurrency exchange, raised HK$1.6 billion ($206 million) after pricing its initial public offering toward the high end of the marketed range, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 俄罗斯油轮因结冰放弃装载受制裁液化天然气的尝试
item.description: 一艘运载液化天然气的 "影子船队 "油轮放弃了从美国批准的俄罗斯北极出口工厂装载燃料的努力，原因可能是冰层堆积，这是莫斯科在寻求扩大运输时面临的又一个挑战。【原文：A shadow fleet tanker carrying liquefied natural gas has abandoned an effort to load fuel from a US-sanctioned export plant in Russia’s Arctic likely due to a buildup in ice, another challenge for Moscow as it seeks to expand shipments.】

item.title: 韩国锌业股价因 68 亿美元的美国冶炼厂报告而大涨
item.description: 韩国锌业有限公司（Korea Zinc Co.据当地媒体报道，这家全球最大的锌冶炼厂正准备批准在美国投资 10 万亿韩元（68 亿美元），并得到美国政府的财政支持。【原文：Korea Zinc Co. Ltd. surged more than 26% on Monday after local media reported that the world’s largest zinc smelter is preparing to approve a 10 trillion won ($6.8 billion)investment in America with financial backing from the US government.】

item.title: 中国化石燃料发电量十年来首次下降
item.description: 随着可再生能源大量涌入电网以满足日益增长的需求，中国化石燃料发电厂的年发电量将出现十年来的首次下降。【原文：China’s fossil fuel power plants are on track to chart their first annual drop in generation in a decade as renewables flood the grid to meet rising demand.】

item.title: 多头将 26,000 点视为 Nifty 50 指数的关键支撑位
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 供应过剩担忧加剧，中东石油市场走弱
item.description: 最近几周，中东石油市场因担心地区供应将超过需求而走弱，这加剧了全球形势疲软的迹象，拖累了基准原油期货。【原文：The Middle Eastern oil market has weakened in recent weeks on concern that regional supplies will outstrip demand, adding to signs of a softening global picture that’s weighed on benchmark crude futures.】

item.title: 新西兰央行行长布雷曼预计将把现金利率维持在 2.25% 的水平一段时间
item.description: 新西兰央行行长安娜-布雷曼（Anna Breman）表示，如果经济形势如预期发展，新西兰央行预计将在一段时间内把官方现金利率维持在当前水平。新西兰元下跌。【原文：New Zealand’s central bank expects to maintain the Official Cash Rate at current levels for some time if economic conditions evolve as expected, Governor Anna Breman said. The kiwi dollar fell.】

item.title: 泰铢在 BOT 利率决定前飙升至四年新高
item.description: 泰铢汇率攀升至四年多来的最高点，这给央行在本周做出政策决定前阻止泰铢反弹造成了压力。【原文：The Thai baht climbed to the highest in more than four years, heaping pressure on the central bank to stem the rally ahead of its policy decision this week.】

item.title: 习近平警告官员不要追逐 "鲁莽 "的 GDP 增长
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平抨击了虚高的增长数字，并誓言要严厉打击追求 "鲁莽 "项目的行为，因为这些项目除了展示表面成果外没有任何意义。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping lashed out at inflated growth numbers and vowed to crack down on the pursuit of “reckless” projects that have no purpose except showing superficial results.】

item.title: 增长放缓，中国零售销售降至科维德以外最差水平
item.description: 中国的零售额增长是科维德事件以来最弱的，而投资则进一步下滑，这凸显了经济在连续数月恶化后面临的日益增长的风险。【原文：China’s retail sales growth was the weakest since the crash caused by Covid while investment slumped further, underlining growing risks to the economy after several months of deterioration.】

item.title: SMBC Asia 首次与 Blackstone、Stonepeak 签订 32 亿美元的 SRT 合同
item.description: 据日本贷款机构周一发表的一份声明称，三井住友银行（Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Banking Corp.’s Asia Pacific arm has completed its first $3.2 billion synthetic risk transfer deal with Blackstone Inc., Stonepeak Partners and Clifford Capital, according to a statement from the Japanese lender on Monday.】

item.title: 中国影子银行的欠款显示房地产压力日益增大
item.description: 中国东部发生的一场 30 亿美元的赎回危机再次引发了人们对监管松散的影子银行业的担忧，因为中国房地产的长期低迷有可能蔓延到金融业。【原文：A $3 billion redemption crisis in eastern China is reviving concerns about the loosely-regulated shadow-banking industry as the nation’s prolonged property slump risks spilling over into the financial sector.】

item.title: 亿万富翁 Coupang 创始人拒绝接受数据泄露听证会传票
item.description: Coupang Inc.的创始人Bom Kim告诉韩国立法者，他不会出席本周举行的关于该国有史以来最大数据泄露事件的议会听证会，理由是工作繁忙。【原文：Coupang Inc.’s founder Bom Kim told South Korean lawmakers he won’t attend this week’s parliamentary hearing on the country’s largest-ever data breach, blaming his busy schedule.】

item.title: 中国房价持续低迷，当局誓言稳定房价
item.description: 11 月份，中国房价持续低迷，这是多年来中国经济低迷的最新一个缩影，政策制定者已承诺加大力度解决这一问题。【原文：China’s home-price slump dragged on in November, the latest chapter in a yearslong downturn that policymakers have promised intensifying efforts to address.】

item.title: Moore Threads 计划将大部分 IPO 募集资金用于购买银行产品
item.description: 中国领先的人工智能芯片制造商摩尔芯科技股份有限公司计划将最近上市募集的大部分资金投入银行产品。【原文：Moore Threads Technology Co., a leading Chinese artificial intelligence chipmaker, plans to put most of the funds raised through its recent listing into banking products.】

item.title: 表决失败后，中国万科誓言改进债券延期计划
item.description: 陷入困境的开发商中国万科集团股份有限公司（China Vanke Co.【原文：Distressed developer China Vanke Co. said it would improve on plans to push back a looming bond payment after creditors balked at its initial proposal, raising the risk of default.】

item.title: 中国移动同意以 10 亿美元收购巴西金矿
item.description: 中国最大的矿商之一招商局集团（CMOC Group）以 10 亿美元收购了 Equinox Gold Corp.【原文：CMOC Group, one of China’s biggest miners, expanded its push into precious metals with a $1 billion deal to buy the Brazilian operations of Equinox Gold Corp.】

item.title: 在人工智能的推动下，林吉特的优异表现将在明年延续
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特有望连续第二年跑赢亚洲同类货币，一些策略师预计这种超额收益将持续到 2026 年。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit is on course to beat its Asian peers for a second straight year, and some strategists are expecting the outperformance to extend into 2026.】

item.title: 伦敦公寓的实际价格在过去十年中下降了 22
item.description: 多年来，英国的年轻专业人士一直面临着一个两难的问题：最好的工作机会却在一个拥有世界上最昂贵房价的城市。【原文：For years, Britain’s young professionals have faced a dilemma: the best job opportunities are in a city that has some of the world’s most exorbitant house prices.】

item.title: 就业网站称，英国最低收入工人的工资增长正在降温
item.description: 新数据显示，由于就业市场恶化削弱了部分劳动力的议价能力，最低收入工人的工资增长开始放缓。【原文：Wage growth for the lowest-paid workers is starting to slow as a worsening jobs market undercuts the bargaining power of a section of the workforce that has proved resistant to the Bank of England’s inflation-fighting efforts, new data shows.】

item.title: 日本工厂景气改善，日本央行加息理由更加充分
item.description: 日本大型制造商的信心升至四年来的最高水平，增强了市场对日本央行本周加息的预期。【原文：Confidence among Japan’s large manufacturers rose to the highest level in four years, reinforcing market expectations for the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates this week.】

item.title: 美联储言论分歧缓和宽松前景，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 在美联储官员发表的相互矛盾的言论促使交易商抑制对美国明年进一步放宽货币政策的押注后，黄金在连续四天上涨后企稳。【原文：Gold steadied following four days of gains, after conflicting remarks from Federal Reserve officials prompted traders to curb bets on further monetary easing in the US next year.】

item.title: 石油保持两个月低位，盈余抵消地缘政治紧张局势
item.description: 由于对供应过剩的担忧超过了对地缘政治紧张局势加剧的担忧，石油价格稳定在近两个月来的最低水平附近。【原文：Oil was steady near the lowest level in almost two months as fears of a glut outweighed heightened geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 中国点心债券热潮持续升温，推动货币化雄心壮志
item.description: 离岸人民币债券的发行量再创新高，这是随着美元吸引力的减弱，中国政府在货币国际化方面取得进展的一个新迹象。【原文：Issuance of offshore yuan bonds rose to another record, a fresh sign of Beijing’s progress on internationalizing its currency as the dollar’s appeal weakens.】

item.title: 福特斯库收购秘鲁勘探者公司，进军铜矿领域
item.description: Fortescue Ltd. 已同意收购总部位于加拿大的勘探公司 Alta Copper Corp.【原文：Fortescue Ltd. has agreed to acquire Canada-based explorer Alta Copper Corp. in a deal that marks the Australian company’s first major foray beyond iron ore into other metals.】

item.title: 关于华纳兄弟与 Netflix 协议的五点误解
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普尚未决定由谁收购华纳兄弟公司【原文：Donald Trump doesn’t decide who gets to buy Warner Bros. -- yet】

item.title: 全球基金认为印度股票是抵御人工智能风险的最佳对冲工具
item.description: 随着对人工智能泡沫的担忧日益加剧，印度正在吸引全球基金经理的新关注，他们希望在未来一年里实现股票投资的多元化。【原文：India is drawing fresh attention from global fund managers looking to diversify equity investments in the coming year as worries over an AI bubble mount.】

item.title: 朝日公司首席执行官考虑成立新的网络安全部门，以应对持续不断的破坏活动
item.description: 朝日集团控股有限公司（Asahi Group Holdings Ltd.）正在考虑建立一个新的网络安全团队，因为 9 月份的勒索软件攻击对公司运营和财务报告造成的破坏预计将持续到新的一年。【原文：Asahi Group Holdings Ltd. is considering to create a new cybersecurity team after disruptions to operations and financial reporting from a September ransomware attack are expected to continue into the new year.】

item.title: 澳大利亚证券交易所面临 1.5 亿澳元的资本支出和监管改革
item.description: 澳大利亚企业监管机构将对澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd.）征收 1.5 亿澳元（约合 9,960 万美元）的资本费用，这是在对陷入困境的交易所运营商进行持续调查之际为保护该国金融市场而采取的一揽子措施的一部分。【原文：Australia’s corporate regulator will impose a A$150 million ($99.6 million) capital charge on ASX Ltd. as part of a package to safeguard the nation’s financial markets amid an ongoing probe into the embattled exchange operator.】

item.title: 科技股担忧加剧，亚洲股市注定下跌：市场综述
item.description: 由于人们对科技公司盈利前景的担忧日益加剧，削弱了风险情绪，亚洲市场将以疲软开盘。【原文：Asian markets are poised for a weak open as mounting concern over the earnings outlook for technology companies saps risk sentiment.】
